name: convert markdown to pdf

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - 'main'
    paths:
      - '.github/workflows/**.yml'
    tags:        
      - v*             # Push events to v1 tag

jobs:
  convert:
    if: ${{ !startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/') }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-18.04
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2 # access repo files

      - uses: actions/setup-python@v2
        with:
          python-version: '3.7' 
          architecture: 'x64' 

      - name: Get current date
        id: date
        run: echo "::set-output name=date::$(date +'%Y-%m-%d')"

      - name: Markdown to PDF
         uses: valtyr/pandoc-action@v0.1-alpha

      - name: UploadArtifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@master
        with:
          name: build-${{ github.run_number }}
          path: artifact

      - name: PushCommit
        if: ${{ !startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/') }}
        run: |
          cp README.pdf backups/${{ steps.date.outputs.date }}-README${{ github.run_number }}.pdf
          cp README.md backups/${{ steps.date.outputs.date }}-README${{ github.run_number }}.md
          git add .
          git commit -m "CI: produce ${{ steps.date.outputs.date }}-README${{ github.run_number }}.pdf"
          git push
  release:
    if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
    runs-on: ubuntu-18.04
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Release
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
        with:
          files: artifact/build.pdf
        env:
          ACTIONS_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_TOKEN }}
